body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug

**What happened**:
sometimes use vi edit /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml, apiserver will be kill, but not restart again; but sometimes is ok, kube-apiserver will restart.(test 10 times, and 2 times problem found)
but if I move this file out of /etc/kubernetes/manifests/, wait for moment, and then move back, apiserver restart, problem fix.

**What you expected to happen**:
edit /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml, apiserver auto-update

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
1. start a k8s cluster. 
2. edit kube-apiserver.yaml by vi editor. 
3. check apiserver status.

**Anything else we need to know?**:
any thing you want to know, please ping me.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```
# kubectl version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.3", GitCommit:"f0efb3cb883751c5ffdbe6d515f3cb4fbe7b7acd", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-08T18:39:33Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.3", GitCommit:"f0efb3cb883751c5ffdbe6d515f3cb4fbe7b7acd", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-08T18:27:48Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:none
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
```
# cat /etc/os-release
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION="16.04.1 LTS (Xenial Xerus)"
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS"
VERSION_ID="16.04"
HOME_URL="http://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="http://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="http://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
UBUNTU_CODENAME=xenial
```
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
```
# uname -a
Linux m-usingle-192-168-4-106 4.4.0-97-generic #120-Ubuntu SMP Tue Sep 19 17:28:18 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```
- Install tools: kubeadm
- Others:none

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: somtime edit /etc/kubernetes/kube-apiserver.yaml by vi, kube-apiserver be killed but not restart forever
